overview: Let's take a journey back to the 1980s and beyond, to discover the origins of the Cyberpunk movement, in literature, cinema, television, video games, comics and more! In this documentary miniseries, we will discover the wonders of Cyberpunk, dating back to the 1940s, all the way through 1989, with each successive episode taking on a new decade.
tagline: Neuromancer, Blade Runner, RoboCop, Akira, Shadowrun
title: Cyberpunk Documentary PART 1
